column3: ['S7: add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle
['S1: Heat-Heat 3 tsp oil in a pan over low heat']
['S2: Add-1/2 tsp cumin seeds to the pan']
['S3: Add-Add 1/4 tsp mustard to the pan']
['S5: Peel-Peel 4 large garlic cloves (Break the garlic while peeling)']
['S7: add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle
['S10: Add-Add 4 tbsp red chili powder to the pan']
['S11: puree-puree tomatoes without any water in a blender/mixer leving some chunks']
['S12: mix-mix well contents of the pan']
['S13: Add-1 tsp salt to the pan']
['S14: Add-Add tomato puree to the pan']
['S15: Mix-Mix well tomato puree with contents in the pan']
['S16: Take-Take the pan off the heat']
['S17: Transfer-Transfer it to a serving bowl']
